metadata.name: Origins #3 Love's Burning Flame
metadata.description:
An electro-acoustic arrangement of Hector Berlioz's Aria "d'amour l'ardente flamme" from his drama "La damnation de Faust"
Text is based on Goethe's Faust with additional text by Almire Gandonni√®re.
Find the English translation in here:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CrZJDVt1N6lyv8vDNG7XaDFShCV4XpD2OSM4rXwlT5w/edit?usp=sharing

Arrangement and music production by Zachary Whitney with singing of Merav Eldan.
Photo sequences of shattering light bulbs and colored water by Shmulik Massoth.
